title: Pick A Side, Before It’s Too Late (Ep 1695)
description:
They’d throw you in gulags if they could. In this episode, I address the growing threat to liberty and freedom from the censorship-obsessed left. 

News Picks:

An overwhelming majority of Americans reject the use of racial qualifications for nominations to the Supreme Court.


Pope Francis has lost his way, and you’re under no obligation to follow him. 


The left is all-in on censorship, and the threat is growing. 

Stunning comments from the teacher’s Union head calling parents racist. 


Here’s a sneak peek of what the GOP majority would do if they take back the House.


What is Pegasus, and why does it matter?
